content.text: Hi, my name is [user 1's name]! What's your name?
Hi, I'm [user 2's name].
It's nice to meet you! What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. I start my senior year of high school next week, so I'm a little bit nervous.
Oh, I know what you mean. Senior year is a big year. But I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play hockey, go to the movies, and hang out with my friends.
Hockey? That's awesome! I love hockey too. What's your favorite team?
My favorite team is the Boston Bruins.
Oh, nice! I'm a fan of the Montreal Canadiens.
Oh, that's cool! I'm not really a fan of the Canadiens, but I respect them.
Thanks! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, go to concerts, and play video games.
I like to go to the movies and play video games too! What are some of your favorite movies and video games?
Some of my favorite movies are The Lord of the Rings trilogy, The Matrix trilogy, and Star Wars.
Oh, those are all great movies! I love the Lord of the Rings trilogy and Star Wars.
Me too! I also like the Harry Potter movies and the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
I like those movies too! So, what are some of your favorite video games?
Some of my favorite video games are The Legend of Zelda, Mario, and Pokémon.
Oh, those are all great games! I love the Legend of Zelda series and Pokémon.
Me too! I also like the Super Mario Bros. series and the Metroid series.
I like those games too! I think we would get along great.
Me too! It's nice to meet you, [user 1's name].
It's nice to meet you too, [user 2's name].
